Description: General sweeping of sidewalks and curb lines
Vacuum all hallway floors
Mop and disinfect all stairwell surfaces
Wipe down lobby glass, elevator doors, and call buttons
Disinfect sinks, toilets, and restock supplies
Wash front areas with power washer
Bring garbage/recycle bins to curb and back
Wipe down bins and floors in trash rooms
Conduct boiler blowdown and log readings
Replace and clean mechanical water filters
Top off domestic water tanks as needed
Clear treepits of litter, mulch and repaint if needed
Remove illegal postings and repaint walls/doors
Deliver mail and packages to tenants or mailroom
Mop floor, wipe surfaces, check lint traps
Sweep and tidy rear building lot or yard
Thorough mop/disinfect stairwells per section
Log tank water level and check float integrity
Clear gutters and downspouts ahead of rain
Ensure covers, signage, salt bins, and gear ready
